name: WOBBLE SHOVLE
description:
Be the last power shovel standing.

What is it?

It's a short and simple King Of The Hill game. Play it together with up to three friends on a local computer. You can also try Parsec to play online.

You are playing a power shovel and you have to protect your construction site! The other players are trying to throw you off the playground and so do you.

How to Play?

Use the keyboard or a controller (Xbox, Playstation, etc.) to play. Each player needs their own. You can drive forwards and backwards, jump, and rotate your arm to push others away.
But watch out! There are hazards falling down, and you can break off your shovel. Be careful...

Music

The game features music by various artists based on a work at Free Music Archive
- eddy
- Scott Holmes
- Forget the Whale

Tip: You can press any music track by pressing "N"

Team
